title: rengar to strong
body:
Today I played Vayne botlane and i was lvl2 and rengar (lvl3 without items) ganks me. Rengar was able to kill me with 1 rotation and I was full life. The enemy adc and supp didnt get a assist and I was shocked that this is possible. I think Rengar should get a nerf and adc´s are not strong enough at the moment.
What do you think about the assasins (specially Rengar) and the weak adc in 6.2.

replies.body:
We have an ADC meta but hey ADC are not strong.

Im done.

i hate player who missplay and blame others for it in this patch where rengar got nerfed hes allready not realy viable and than appear a guy like you and cry uhhhhh i died the other champ musst be op lv 2 vayne should never die against lvl 3 rengar if both have full hp

an assassin is created for kill squishy and soft targets fast. so in other words: he did his job and btw. he was nerfed in the last patch. but i wonder how he was able to kill you so early. you must stand still for that and playing without a supp. and adcÂ´s are strong
